About the Company: Tata Communications Ltd provides a range of services that includes transmission, IP, converged voice, mobility, managed network connectivity, hosting and storage, managed security, managed collaboration and business transformation for global enterprises and service providers, as well as Internet, retail broadband and content services for Indian consumers.The company has the most advanced & largest submarine cable networks. Their Tier-1 IP network connectivity is spread over 200 countries with 300 Pops (Point-of-Presence).Tata Communications launched Vulnerability Management Service (VMS) with Qualys , it is built upon Qualys` industry leading QualysGuard vulnerability management and compliance solutions.VMS provides organizations with a cost-efficient and comprehensive method to monitor mitigate and manage risks that threaten the Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability of data assets within the enterprise information infrastructure.They have also expanded their global MPLS (Multi-Protocol Label Switching) services in South East Asian destinations which includes the Philippines, Malaysia, Taiwan, and Thailand..The company also engagged in the business of GVS, GDMS.
